links.*: J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment

wikitext.*:
'''Cecilia Barella''' is a member of the [[Italian Tolkien Society]]. Barella is also the editor of ''A Tolkien Webliography'', a blog that tries to document Tolkien's texts on the net. As of July 2010, however, the work on the blog seems to be abandoned (no update since January 2008).
